channel.title: Moparscape,Website
channel.description:
I hope im not breaking any rules but how do i make a website like this,i want it to be like my forums for my rsps
THANKS!!

item.title: Moparscape,Website
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

You’re going to need to choose a webhost (a place that will hold your website for you) and a forums software (like SMF).

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:2, topic:345577”]http://simplemachines.org/
and
http://www.unlimitedmb.com/ or http://www.000webhost.com/[/quote]unlimitedmb is horrible, and if you want incredibly slow ftp transfer then go for 000webhost… Also, there are a number of times that 000webhost wont accept the config files of forum software for some reason in which case you’ll have to upload a modified version.
Unlimitedmb’s free hosting (not sure about premium) automatically pends you to an infinityad list, meaning you’re site will host an incredibly annoying pop-up ad upon entering your site.

A fairly cheep premium webhost would be http://www.hostgator.com/. Otherwise, I’d suggest godaddy.

Read full topic
